embeds.title: Settings Info Page
embeds.description:
**Themes**
- Themes are the background of the rendered image and can be unlocked by voting
- Voter themes have a temporary access period after voting
- Exclusive themes are available anytime for those who have unlocked them
- A premium subscription unlocks all voter themes permanently but not all exclusive themes

**Reset Times**
- You can set a time for your tracked stats to reset by specifying a GMT offset and the desired reset hour. This allows you to configure reset times based on your local time, regardless of your location.
- Discord-based reset times take priority over player-based reset times.
- When a Discord account changes its reset time, any linked player's reset time will update to match.
- Players are automatically assigned a random reset hour when their historical tracking is initiated.
- Player-based reset times are used if a Discord-based reset time is not configured
